definitions.title: vb. Pa.
definitions.body: speak, say (so Targum Syr.; cf. BH [[מלל]]

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: (rare));—Pf.  3 ms. [[מַלֵּל]] Da 6:22 he spoke with ([[עִם]] pers.); acc. of words, Impf. 3 ms. [[י֫מַêִלּל]] Da 7:25 (c. [[לְחַד]] of God); so Pt. act. [[מְמַלִּל]] v:Da 7:8 (van d. H. here [[מְמַלֵּל]]), v:Da 7:20; f. [[מְמַלֱּלָא]] (K:§ 15d)) v:Da 7:11.
